item.title: Black Ball in the Urn
item.description: One way of looking at human creativity is as a process of pulling balls out of a giant urn. The balls represent possible ideas, discoveries, technological inventions… What we haven’t extracted, so far, is a black ball: a technology that invariably or by default destroys the civilization that invents it.
